00036 MergeScanner::MergeScanner(ScanContextPtr &scan_ctx, bool return_dels) : CellListScanner(scan_ctx), m_done(false), m_initialized(false), m_scanners(), m_queue(), m_delete_present(false), m_deleted_row(0), m_deleted_column_family(0), m_deleted_cell(0), m_return_deletes(return_dels), m_row_count(0), m_row_limit(0), m_cell_count(0), m_cell_limit(0), m_cell_cutoff(0), m_prev_key(0) {
00037   if (scan_ctx->spec != 0)
00038     m_row_limit = scan_ctx->spec->row_limit;
00039   m_start_timestamp = scan_ctx->interval.first;
00040   m_end_timestamp = scan_ctx->interval.second;
00041 }

00045 void MergeScanner::add_scanner(CellListScanner *scanner) {
00046   m_scanners.push_back(scanner);

00051 MergeScanner::~MergeScanner() {
00052   for (size_t i=0; i<m_scanners.size(); i++)
00053     delete m_scanners[i];
00054   if (m_release_callback)
00055     m_release_callback();
00056 }

00060 void MergeScanner::forward() {
00061   ScannerState sstate;
00062   Key key;
00063   size_t len;
00064 
00065   if (m_queue.empty())
00066     return;
00067 
00068   sstate = m_queue.top();
00069 
00074   while (true) {
00075 
00076     while (true) {
00077 
00078       m_queue.pop();
00079       sstate.scanner->forward();
00080       if (sstate.scanner->get(sstate.key, sstate.value))
00081         m_queue.push(sstate);
00082 
00083       if (m_queue.empty())
00084         return;
00085 
00086       sstate = m_queue.top();
00087 
00088       if (!key.load(sstate.key)) {
00089         HT_ERROR("Problem decoding key!");
00090       }
00091       else if (key.timestamp < m_start_timestamp) {
00092         continue;
00093       }
00094       else if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW) {
00095         len = strlen(key.row) + 1;
00096         if (m_delete_present && m_deleted_row.fill() == len && !memcmp(m_deleted_row.base, key.row, len)) {
00097           if (m_deleted_row_timestamp < key.timestamp)
00098             m_deleted_row_timestamp = key.timestamp;
00099         }
00100         else {
00101           m_deleted_row.clear();
00102           m_deleted_row.ensure(len);
00103           memcpy(m_deleted_row.base, key.row, len);
00104           m_deleted_row.ptr = m_deleted_row.base + len;
00105           m_deleted_row_timestamp = key.timestamp;
00106           m_delete_present = true;
00107         }
00108         if (m_return_deletes)
00109           break;
00110       }
00111       else if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_COLUMN_FAMILY) {
00112         len = key.column_qualifier - key.row;
00113         if (m_delete_present && m_deleted_column_family.fill() == len && !memcmp(m_deleted_column_family.base, key.row, len)) {
00114           if (m_deleted_column_family_timestamp < key.timestamp)
00115             m_deleted_column_family_timestamp = key.timestamp;
00116         }
00117         else {
00118           m_deleted_column_family.clear();
00119           m_deleted_column_family.ensure(len);
00120           memcpy(m_deleted_column_family.base, key.row, len);
00121           m_deleted_column_family.ptr = m_deleted_column_family.base + len;
00122           m_deleted_column_family_timestamp = key.timestamp;
00123           m_delete_present = true;
00124         }
00125         if (m_return_deletes)
00126           break;
00127       }
00128       else if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_CELL) {
00129         len = (key.column_qualifier - key.row) + strlen(key.column_qualifier) + 1;
00130         if (m_delete_present && m_deleted_cell.fill() == len && !memcmp(m_deleted_cell.base, key.row, len)) {
00131           if (m_deleted_cell_timestamp < key.timestamp)
00132             m_deleted_cell_timestamp = key.timestamp;
00133         }
00134         else {
00135           m_deleted_cell.clear();
00136           m_deleted_cell.ensure(len);
00137           memcpy(m_deleted_cell.base, key.row, len);
00138           m_deleted_cell.ptr = m_deleted_cell.base + len;
00139           m_deleted_cell_timestamp = key.timestamp;
00140           m_delete_present = true;
00141         }
00142         if (m_return_deletes)
00143           break;
00144       }
00145       else {
00146         if (key.timestamp >= m_end_timestamp)
00147           continue;
00148         if (!m_return_deletes && m_delete_present) {
00149           if (m_deleted_cell.fill() > 0) {
00150             len = (key.column_qualifier - key.row) + strlen(key.column_qualifier) + 1;
00151             if (m_deleted_cell.fill() == len && !memcmp(m_deleted_cell.base, key.row, len)) {
00152               if (key.timestamp <= m_deleted_cell_timestamp)
00153                 continue;
00154               break;
00155             }
00156             m_deleted_cell.clear();
00157           }
00158           if (m_deleted_column_family.fill() > 0) {
00159             len = key.column_qualifier - key.row;
00160             if (m_deleted_column_family.fill() == len && !memcmp(m_deleted_column_family.base, key.row, len)) {
00161               if (key.timestamp <= m_deleted_column_family_timestamp)
00162                 continue;
00163               break;
00164             }
00165             m_deleted_column_family.clear();
00166           }
00167           if (m_deleted_row.fill() > 0) {
00168             len = strlen(key.row) + 1;
00169             if (m_deleted_row.fill() == len && !memcmp(m_deleted_row.base, key.row, len)) {
00170               if (key.timestamp <= m_deleted_row_timestamp)
00171                 continue;
00172               break;
00173             }
00174             m_deleted_row.clear();
00175           }
00176           m_delete_present = false;
00177         }
00178         break;
00179       }
00180     }
00181 
00182     const uint8_t *prev_key;
00183     size_t prev_key_len = sstate.key.decode_length(&prev_key);
00184 
00185     if (m_prev_key.fill() != 0) {
00186 
00187       if (m_row_limit) {
00188         if (strcmp(key.row, (const char *)m_prev_key.base)) {
00189           m_row_count++;
00190           if (m_row_count >= m_row_limit) {
00191             m_done = true;
00192             return;
00193           }
00194           m_prev_key.set(prev_key, prev_key_len);
00195           m_cell_limit = m_scan_context_ptr->family_info[key.column_family_code].max_versions;
00196           m_cell_cutoff = m_scan_context_ptr->family_info[key.column_family_code].cutoff_time;
00197           m_cell_count = 0;
00198           return;
00199         }
00200       }
00201 
00202       if (prev_key_len == m_prev_key.fill() && prev_key_len > 9 && !memcmp(prev_key, m_prev_key.base, prev_key_len-9)) {
00203         if (m_cell_limit) {
00204           m_cell_count++;
00205           m_prev_key.set(prev_key, prev_key_len);
00206           if (m_cell_count >= m_cell_limit)
00207             continue;
00208         }
00209       }
00210       else {
00211         m_prev_key.set(prev_key, prev_key_len);
00212         m_cell_limit = m_scan_context_ptr->family_info[key.column_family_code].max_versions;
00213         m_cell_cutoff = m_scan_context_ptr->family_info[key.column_family_code].cutoff_time;
00214         m_cell_count = 0;
00215       }
00216 
00217     }
00218     else {
00219       m_prev_key.set(prev_key, prev_key_len);
00220       m_cell_limit = m_scan_context_ptr->family_info[key.column_family_code].max_versions;
00221       m_cell_cutoff = m_scan_context_ptr->family_info[key.column_family_code].cutoff_time;
00222       m_cell_count = 0;
00223     }
00224 
00225     break;
00226   }
00227 
00228 
00229 }

00233 bool MergeScanner::get(ByteString &key, ByteString &value) {
00234 
00235   if (!m_initialized)
00236     initialize();
00237 
00238   if (!m_queue.empty() && !m_done) {
00239     const ScannerState &sstate = m_queue.top();
00240     // check for row or cell limit
00241     key = sstate.key;
00242     value = sstate.value;
00243     return true;
00244   }
00245   return false;
00246 }

00249 
00250 void MergeScanner::initialize() {
00251   ScannerState sstate;
00252   while (!m_queue.empty())
00253     m_queue.pop();
00254   for (size_t i=0; i<m_scanners.size(); i++) {
00255     if (m_scanners[i]->get(sstate.key, sstate.value)) {
00256       sstate.scanner = m_scanners[i];
00257       m_queue.push(sstate);
00258     }
00259   }
00260   while (!m_queue.empty()) {
00261     sstate = m_queue.top();
00262     Key key;
00263     if (!key.load(sstate.key)) {
00264       assert(!"MergeScanner::initialize() - Problem decoding key!");
00265     }
00266 
00267     if (key.timestamp < m_start_timestamp) {
00268       m_queue.pop();
00269       sstate.scanner->forward();
00270       if (sstate.scanner->get(sstate.key, sstate.value))
00271         m_queue.push(sstate);
00272       continue;
00273     }
00274 
00275     if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW) {
00276       size_t len = strlen(key.row) + 1;
00277       m_deleted_row.clear();
00278       m_deleted_row.ensure(len);
00279       memcpy(m_deleted_row.base, key.row, len);
00280       m_deleted_row.ptr = m_deleted_row.base + len;
00281       m_deleted_row_timestamp = key.timestamp;
00282       m_delete_present = true;
00283       if (!m_return_deletes)
00284         forward();
00285     }
00286     else if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_COLUMN_FAMILY) {
00287       size_t len = key.column_qualifier - key.row;
00288       m_deleted_column_family.clear();
00289       m_deleted_column_family.ensure(len);
00290       memcpy(m_deleted_column_family.base, key.row, len);
00291       m_deleted_column_family.ptr = m_deleted_column_family.base + len;
00292       m_deleted_column_family_timestamp = key.timestamp;
00293       m_delete_present = true;
00294       if (!m_return_deletes)
00295         forward();
00296     }
00297     else if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_CELL) {
00298       size_t len = (key.column_qualifier - key.row) + strlen(key.column_qualifier) + 1;
00299       m_deleted_cell.clear();
00300       m_deleted_cell.ensure(len);
00301       memcpy(m_deleted_cell.base, key.row, len);
00302       m_deleted_cell.ptr = m_deleted_cell.base + len;
00303       m_deleted_cell_timestamp = key.timestamp;
00304       m_delete_present = true;
00305       if (!m_return_deletes)
00306         forward();
00307     }
00308     else {
00309       if (key.timestamp >= m_end_timestamp) {
00310         m_queue.pop();
00311         sstate.scanner->forward();
00312         if (sstate.scanner->get(sstate.key, sstate.value))
00313           m_queue.push(sstate);
00314         continue;
00315       }
00316       m_delete_present = false;
00317       const uint8_t *ptr;
00318       size_t len = sstate.key.decode_length(&ptr);
00319       m_prev_key.set(ptr, len);
00320       m_cell_limit = m_scan_context_ptr->family_info[key.column_family_code].max_versions;
00321       m_cell_cutoff = m_scan_context_ptr->family_info[key.column_family_code].cutoff_time;
00322       m_cell_count = 0;
00323     }
00324     break;
00325   }
00326 
00327   m_initialized = true;
00328 }
